name: Planetarium Dome
description: Immersive space projection showcasing planets, stars, and galaxies with guided narration and interactive stargazing sessions.

name: Fossil Gallery
description: Collection of ancient fossils, trace imprints and dinosaur bones with educational panels on geological timescales.

name: Robotics Lab
description: Hands-on station featuring programmable robots, basic automation demos, and sensor experiments for learners.
